title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When working in the Photon version of Eclipse, the popup menu in the Java editor ruler is not displaying when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu should allow users to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A menu should appear with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
Actual: The menu does not appear.
EB: A popup menu should be displayed when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, allowing users to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A menu should appear with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
Actual: The menu does not appear.
